MemberSignature.Value: public override void EndPlacement ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void EndPlacement() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub EndPlacement ()
public: override void EndPlacement();

summary.span: 結束讓使用者放置聚合線條註解。

span.span: Ends the user placement of a polyline annotation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會結束先前啟動的註解定位作業方法呼叫。This method ends an annotation placement operation previously started by a method call. 您不需要呼叫這個方法，因為使用者輸入所需的所有點時，就會自動結束位置。You are not required to call this method, because placement will automatically end when an end user enters all required points. 不過，它時，註解位置需要中止，因為某些原因。However, it is useful when an annotation placement operation needs to be aborted for some reason.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath GraphicsPath { get; set; }
.property instance class System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath GraphicsPath
Public Overridable Property GraphicsPath As GraphicsPath
public: virtual property System::Drawing::Drawing2D::GraphicsPath ^ GraphicsPath { System::Drawing::Drawing2D::GraphicsPath ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Drawing2D::GraphicsPath ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定聚合線條註解在執行階段的路徑點。

span.span: Gets or sets the path points of a polyline annotation at run time.

value.span: 具有聚合線條圖案的 物件。

span.span: A object with the polyline shape.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 聚合線條都必須使用座標相對於註解物件，其中 (0，0) 代表左上角座標和 (100100) 代表註解的右下角座標。A polyline must use coordinates relative to an annotation object, where (0,0) denotes the top-left coordinates and (100,100) denotes the bottom-right coordinates of the annotation. 這個屬性不能存取在設計階段，當您應該使用屬性改為。This property is not accessible at design time, when you should use the property instead.

Public ReadOnly Property GraphicsPathPoints As AnnotationPathPointCollection

public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AnnotationPathPointCollection ^ GraphicsPathPoints { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AnnotationPathPointCollection ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartCollectionEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定聚合線條註解在設計階段的路徑點。

span.span: Gets or sets the path points of the polyline annotation at design time.

value.span: 具有聚合線條圖案的 物件。

span.span: An object with the polyline shape.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 聚合線條都必須使用座標相對於註解物件，其中 (0，0) 代表左上角座標和 (100100) 代表註解的右下角座標。A polyline must use coordinates relative to an annotation object, where (0,0) denotes the top-left coordinates and (100,100) denotes the bottom-right coordinates of the annotation. 這個屬性不能存取在執行階段，當您應該使用屬性改為。This property is not accessible at run time, when you should use the property instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool IsFreeDrawPlacement { get; set; }
.property instance bool IsFreeDrawPlacement
Public Overridable Property IsFreeDrawPlacement As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsFreeDrawPlacement { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標會判斷是否應使用手繪模式來放置註解。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether an annotation should be placed using the free-draw mode.

value.span: 如果應使用手繪模式放置註解，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if an annotation should be placed using free-draw mode, otherwise .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援兩種不同的位置模式時方法呼叫。Two different placement modes are supported when the method is called. 設定屬性`true`從預設模式切換至手繪模式，可讓使用者移動滑鼠游標時的可用繪圖。Set the property to `true` to switch from the default mode to free-draw mode, which allows the user to free draw while moving the mouse cursor. 若要讓使用者可用的繪製註解，您也必須設定屬性`true`。To allow the user to free draw the annotation, you must also set the property to `true`.
